resources.string: \t\tI forgot that we have classes today. So I created this application - a business card today at the university when I was waiting to start classes!\n \t\tI am actively learning the programming language Java, Java for Android applications. Today I know the Python programming language and some methods for analyzing big data.\n \t\tIn the future, I want to become an Android developer or, more specifically, an Android game developer.
Browser apps aren\'t found on this mobile
